column3: and just coffee. I also special-ordered cakes with them
column4: a process that they made SUPER easy. The cakes were simply stunning and tasted incredible. I love their regularly changing menu options
column7: and coffee bar. Everything here is simply superb. They have community seating in sections so they can get more people in to eat at one time. It's a good way to meet new people. A little loud on the weekends
